item.title: BitBay Community Update — 4th March 2019
item.dc:creator: @sh_rn sh___
item.description:
@sh_rn wrote:

In this update:

  • development team updates
  • a new foundation
  • a new structure
  • web markets beta v0.3
  • dynamic peg demo

Some things never change. No matter how many times you say the phrase “we are not a company”, exchanges still insist on knowing who your CEO is. Take Apple for example, and our continuing efforts to get the BitBay web wallet listed in the iTunes app store: “Your wallet app must be published under a seller name and company name that reflects the BitBay name”.

Another example is the rejection of our listing application by Kucoin: “the rating for your company finances is far below our standard”.

They have yet to grasp one of BitBay’s core principles: we are not a company and never will be!

Something had to change to make it easier for the BitBay project to function within the legal frameworks imposed on it… so after many discussions we have decided to form a new legal entity, called the BitBay Foundation (more on this below) .

With the new legal status, we will be able to satisfy the requirements that other companies have when dealing with crypto projects. This idea of separating BitBay’s legal workings from its useable products has been something we’ve been thinking about for a while, and now it’s becoming a reality. However, we still need the community’s input to make this all happen.

But first…

Dev Team Updates

After many months conceptualising and coding the world’s most advanced stablecoin protocol, BitBays lead developer, David Zimbeck, has decided to take a step back from his position as lead developer, and take on more of an advisory role. David’s insights and ideas will still continue to strongly influence and drive the BitBay team, but as the main coding work for the BitBay Marketplace Client and Dynamic Peg have now been completed, he felt it was a good time to take a break from the computer keyboard and help the rest of the team integrate the peg protocol with the demo exchange.

Now that he has a bit more free time, we may even see him venturing out into the crypto wilderness, making the occasional conference appearance and doing some interviews! Watch this space…

The BitBay Foundation

We are working with a leading legal firm in Estonia to setup the new BitBay Foundation. It will initially have three membership levels: ‘board members’, ‘advisors’ and ‘members’, starting with three board members (Bjørn Alsos, Craig Claussen, Shorn Keld) with David Zimbeck as advisor to the board.

Membership of the foundation will be open to anyone who holds at least 1 $BAY.

The aims of the foundation are as follows:

  • Working to advance BitBay’s interests in society
  • Function as a networking hub and forum for BitBay’s employees, volunteers, and users.
  • To be a driving force in the development and marketing of the BitBay software. The long term focus of this shall be on enabling trade in developing countries through ‘smart contracts’ for those who are unable to participate in existing digital trade solutions.

The foundation will be formed in March/April and a new website will be available soon, at bitbay.foundation , with info on how to join.

A New Structure

The graphic below shows how we are proposing to introduce a new structure to the current websites and products, and also introduces a new voting system via the community forum (more on this below in the self-governance section)

1*EOWc46KeBc_lD5oow1D6Zw.png2479x2142 215 KB

The current website will have a new home at ‘bitbay.community’, and instead of being built in the Drupal CMS, will be open-sourced on GitHub, so community contributors can help maintain the website. We will then move the web markets beta to its new domain at ‘bitbay.market’, to become the main landing page for this new flagship product. In a move to introduce a more democratic process, the forum will also become a place where the community can cast their votes on submitted proposals. The exact method of self-governance has yet to be agreed upon, but this will also be put to a democratic vote to ensure transparency and fairness going forward.

These are all big changes. To bring some experience and give guidance while this new structure is setup, the foundation board and members will make themselves available to support the community in its efforts to transition to a fully-democratic and open project.

Web Markets Beta

Yesterday our web markets team completed the implementation of the “live update” service for our internal testing. As this stage is almost complete, we will be rolling it out to beta this week for everyone to test beta v0.3.

This new feature allows online users to see updates of their escrow contracts in real-time, meaning better feedback on the status of deals. The devs have now connected all the important statuses, and attention-requiring events can now be seen without reloading a web page or panel.

We’ll announce the private release of this next version in the Slack channel early this week, so come and join us if you aren’t already one of our beta testers. You can signup here:

http://eepurl.com/dCI2IL

With the “live update” service and recent fixes to the email notification system, we are almost ready to release the public beta version. A provisional date for the public beta release has been set for the 11th March .

1*yaZfB55tAL4Fw-PUYGIS_Q.png1120x671 135 KB

Still to come in the next updates:

  1. Currently the markets data is stored on a central database for testing purposes. This will be moved to a decentralised solution once we have finished the research and testing stage
  2. Variable deposits for buyer and seller
  3. Variable contract length
  4. Raise a dispute with the other party
  5. A full security audit for the DDE smart contract code
  6. UI and UX improvements

Dynamic Peg

The developers working on the peg and exchange demo have now successfully completed testing of all associated API functions with the demo exchange. The team has been performing some test trading with BAY/BTC and the final step is to connect and test the wallet “deposits and withdrawals” system.

Once this final stage has been completed, we will be announcing how you can join us in testing the dynamic peg on the demo exchange. We anticipate this public phase could start as early as 2–3 weeks from now, depending on the progress this week with the wallet functions.

This public testing stage will allow us to show everyone how the peg works, and also how it benefits both traders and exchanges.

Read more about the Dynamic Peg on the BitBay website.

That’s everything for this update, but remember to join us in Discord or Telegramor leave your comments below.

Until next time,

Shorn Keld
Project Manager @ BitBay

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: London Cryptocurrency Conference - Ticket Competition!
item.dc:creator: @sh_rn sh___
item.description:
@sh_rn wrote:

Our Operations Manager Bjørn Alsos will be one of the speakers at The London Cryptocurrency Show on April 14th (http://www.londoncryptocurrencyshow.com). To celebrate this we’re giving away two free tickets and the chance to hang out with members of the BitBay team!

Simply post your answer below to the following question for a chance to win:

“What important BitBay fact should Bjørn not forget to mention at the conference?”

Send us your suggestions! We’ll pick our 2 favourites and announce the winners here on Tuesday, April 10th.

Participants: 1

item.title: Actualización de comunidad 11 de marzo
item.dc:creator: @Manuela Manuela Grisales
item.description:
@Manuela wrote:

Marzo 11.pdf (220.4 KB)

CommunityUpdate (1).jpg1259x406 75.5 KB

Mira esta introducción clara de BitBay en CoinCentral. ¡Hemos visto una reciente afluencia de atención en nuestra plataforma en varios sitios web relacionados con criptomoneda, el impulso está mejorando!

¿Quieres ver a BAY en otra bolsa? Haga clic aquí para participar en el voto de usuarios para el intercambio de Altcoin.io. ¡Cada voto cuenta!

La nueva GUI aún está programada para ser lanzada a tiempo. Con una nueva y elegante estética, avanzaremos para dar a conocer nuestra nueva imagen y lograr que la Cripto comunidad se entusiasme más que nunca con las ventajas de Double Deposit Escrow, el sistema Dynamic Pegging y nuestras exclusivas plantillas Smart Contract para aplicaciones comerciales.

Algunos usuarios han informado sobre problemas menores con nuestra billetera web. Nos gustaría asegurarle a la comunidad que todo con la cadena de bloques funciona y nadie ha perdido el acceso a sus monedas. Si alguien experimenta más problemas, contáctanos a través del foro y podemos ayudarte.

Como siempre, gracias por tu interés en el Proyecto BitBay!

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: Community Update 11\03\2018 تحديث المجتمع الأسبوعي
item.dc:creator: @Turkkiendez Mohamed Tourki
item.description:
@Turkkiendez wrote:

2018 تحديث المجتمع الأسبوعي.pdf (228.9 KB)

CommunityUpdate.jpg1259x406 79.7 KB

تفقد هذا الشرح الرائع عن BitBay المقدم من موقع كوين سنترال! نلاحظ اهتمام متتابع بمشروعنا من عدة مواقع مختصة بالعملات الإلكترونية، نحن نتسلق الجبل!

هل تريد لعملتنا ان تصب قابلة للتداول بمنصات تبادل عملات إلكترونية أخرى؟ اضغط هنا للدخول في التصويت المقرر من موقع altcoin.io، كل تصويت منكم يأهلنا للمضي قدماً!

واجهة المستخدم الجديدة الخاصة بالعملاء ستكون جاهزة في الوقت المحدد، مع خصائص جمالية جديدة ورائعة، سنمضي قدمًا في الإعلان عن الشكل الجديد وإعلام متتبعي العملات الإلكترونية بالميزة الحصرية والخاصة بنا (الإيداع من الطرفين (البائع والشاري)( لمنع حدوث أي تلاعب من الطرفين.

بعض مستخدمينا قاموا بالتبليغ عن مشاكل بمحفظة الويب الخاصة بنا – نرغب بإعلام متتبعينا إن كل شيء مع البلوكتشاين يشتغل على ما يرام ولا أحد سيخسر أي قطعة من عملاته عند حدوث أي مشكلة، على كل حال الأن تم إصلاح كل الأخطاء، اذا كنت تواجه أي مشكلة يرجى مراسلتنا على منتدى الدعم الفني الخاص بنا، وسنكون حتماً بمساعدتك مباشرة!

كالعادة، شكراً لاهتمامكم بمشروع BitBay!

صفحتنا على تويتر : www.twitter.com/BitBayAlarab

item.title: Community Update 11/03/18 en français
item.dc:creator: @BayCorti
item.description:
@BayCorti wrote:

Twitter 1024x512.png1024x512 81 KB

  • Allez voir cette courte introduction à propose de BitBay sur CoinCentral. Nous avons remarqué un récent pic d’attention à propos de notre plateforme sur plusieurs sites en rapport avec les cryptos, le momentum est en train de prendre!

  • Vous voulez voir BAY listé sur un autre site d’exchange? Cliquez ici pour participer au vote des utilisateurs pour Altcoin.io exchange. Chaque vote compte!

  • Le nouveau GUI est toujours programmé pour être sorti en temps et en heure. Avec un nouveau et plus esthétique design, nous allons aller de l’avant et rendre public notre nouveau look et laisser la communauté crypto plus excitée que jamais concernant les avantages du Double Deposit Escrow, du système de Dynamic Peg et de nos modèles de Smart Contract unique pour les applications commerciales.

  • Certains utilisateurs ont reportés des problèmes mineurs concernant notre Web Wallet. Nous voudrions assurer à la communauté que tout est dans l’ordre concernant la blockchain et que personne n’a perdu ses BAY. Si quelqu’un rencontre des problèmes, veuillez nous contacter via le forum et nous pourrons vous aider!

Comme toujours, merci pour votre intérêt pour le Projet BitBay!

https://twitter.com/BitBayofficial
https://t.me/bitbayofficial

item.title: Community Update 11/03/2018 (Russian) Еженедельное Обновление BitBay (11/03/2018)
item.dc:creator: @igors.fridkins IgorsLV
item.description:
@igors.fridkins wrote:

  • Зацените этоаккуратно написанное введение к BitBay на CoinCentral. Мы увидели недавний приток внимания к нашей платформе на сайтах, связанных с криптографией - проект набирает обороты!

  • Хотите увидеть BAY на другой бирже? Нажмите здесь, чтобы принять участие в голосовании за листинг на бирже Altcoin.io. Каждый голос имеет значение!

  • Новый графический интерфейс все еще планируется выпустить вовремя. Благодаря новой, гладкой эстетике, мы будем двигаться только вперед для публикации нашего нового вида и для того, чтобы еще больше взбудоражить наше сообщество с помощью преимуществ в виде Двойного Депонирования Депозита, Системы Dynamic Peg и наших уникальных шаблонов Смарт-Контрактов для коммерческих приложений.

  • Некоторые пользователи сообщили о незначительных проблемах с нашим веб-кошельком - мы хотели бы заверить наше сообщество, что все, что связано с блокчейном, находится в рабочем состоянии, и никто не потерял доступ к своим монетам. Если у кого-то возникнут дополнительные проблемы, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с нами через форум, и мы сможем Вам помочь!

И как всегда, благодарим Вас за интерес к проекту BitBay!

BitBay

BitBay - Official Crypto-Currency Coin, Decentralized Markets, Unbreakable Smart...

BitBay is a fully-functional decentralized marketplace and smart contracting platform, backed by a secure cryptocurrency.

item.title: Community Update 2018年3月11日 日本語
item.dc:creator: @Akio.Sashima Akio Sashima
item.description:
@Akio.Sashima wrote:

0311.png1259x406 103 KB

  • CoinCentralでのBitBay紹介記事をご覧ください。最近、私たちのプラットフォームが注目を集め始めており、様々な暗号通貨関連サイトやmomentumで取り上げていただいています！

  • BAYをもっと多くの取引所に上場して欲しいですか？ここをクリックして、Altcoin.io取引所のユーザー投票にご参加ください。清き一票をよろしくお願いします！

  • 新しいGUIは予定通りにリリースされます。新しく滑らかな美しさで、二重預託金エスクロー、ダイナミック・ペッグ・システム、および商用アプリケーション用の独自のスマートコントラクト・テンプレート以上に、暗号コミュニティを湧かせることになります。

  • 数名のユーザーの方から、ウェブウォレットに関するマイナーな問題をご指摘いただいています。ここで今一度、私たちのブロックチェーンは問題なく稼働しており、誰も自分のコインへのアクセスを失ってはいないことをお伝えさせていただくことで、コミュニティーの皆様にはご安心頂きたいと思います。もし問題が生じている場合は、フォーラムを通じてご連絡ください。私たちがアシストさせていただきます！

いつもBitBayプロジェクトにご関心頂きまして、ありがとうございます！
